item.description:
On Saturday 10th September the Boston Demons will take on the New York Magpies in the Keegan Heavey Memorial Game in honor of teammate and good friend Keegan.

Boston Lady Demons v New York Lady Pies: 12:30pm

Boston Demons v New York Magpies: 2:00pm

The girls will be making their home ground debut at 12:30pm with the mens game following at 2:00pm.

There will be food and drinks at the game as well as a fun, family environment.

Following the on field clash we will all head to Battery Park (33 Batterymarch St, Boston) for after game celebrations and fellowship.

 Bring one, bring all for what will be a great game and great day.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Demons v NY footy match
